Hi there,Thanks for yor help. But the problem not solved. Ads still exist on site m.baomoi.comOn Jul 7, 2022, at 4:11 PM, jellizaveta ***@***.***> wrote:﻿

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @Jean-PierreJ > I have been off Facebook for a while and just started up again about a week ago. I noticed the odd ad coming through so updated all filters. That didn’t work, so I activated all of the free filters and options. Unfortunately, Facebook seems to have found a way around this. ### Screenshots
